## Description ##

Represents an agent with only a location and an orientation.

## Property Descriptions ##


### position ###

```gdscript
var position: Vector3
```

The agent's position in space.

### orientation ###

```gdscript
var orientation: float
```

The agent's orientation on its Y axis rotation.
